title: Obtain Preauthorization for Surgery
description: A surgery scheduler needs to obtain preauthorization from a patient's insurance company for a scheduled procedure.

tasks.description: Identify the patient, their insurance, and the CPT code for the planned surgery.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary information for the authorization request.

tasks.description: Submit the preauthorization request to the payer through their provider portal, attaching relevant clinical documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the request with supporting documents.

tasks.description: Receive and document the authorization number in the patient's record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives an approval and enters the authorization number into the EHR, clearing the procedure for billing.
